code: export var setBet=function setBet(bet){return{type:'SET_BET',payload:bet};};export var dealCards=function dealCards(dealerCard,hiddenCard,playerCard1,playerCard2,dealerScore,playerScore){return{type:'DEAL_CARDS',payload:{dealerCard:dealerCard,hiddenCard:hiddenCard,playerCard1:playerCard1,playerCard2:playerCard2,dealerScore:dealerScore,playerScore:playerScore}};};export var hit=function hit(card,score){return{type:'HIT',payload:{card:card,score:score}};};export var stand=function stand(hand,score){return{type:'STAND',payload:{hand:hand,score:score}};};export var resetGame=function resetGame(){return{type:'RESET_GAME'};};
